sentences.en: All of his clothes are in monotone black.
sentences.cn: 瞧他的衣服,一划的都是黑色的,真单调.

sentences.en: Does Monotone Locally Bounded Function Definitely Have Extreme?
sentences.cn: “单调有界函数必有极限” 吗 ?

sentences.en: He answered all the lawyer’s questions in a dull monotone.
sentences.cn: 他用单调的语气回答了律师所有的问题。

sentences.en: He spoke in a flat monotone.
He was seen on TV delivering platitudes about the crisis in a monotone voice.
sentences.cn: 人们看到他在电视上念经似地就危机问题老调重弹。

sentences.en: His voice lapsed to a monotone his eyes becoming fixed.
sentences.cn: 他声音渐渐变得单调乏味了,眼睛呆瞪着.

sentences.en: In this paper, a new non monotone trust region method is presented.
sentences.cn: 该文提出一种新的非单调信赖域方法.

sentences.en: Numerical results show that the non monotone methods are more efficient.
sentences.cn: 数值试验表明,新算法是有效的.

sentences.en: Only two monotone voice notes, reminders true open villages.
sentences.cn: “布谷布谷!”只有两个单调音符的歌声, 催开村庄道道柴扉.

sentences.en: She talked in a deep nasal monotone.
sentences.cn: 她说话鼻音很重，语调单一。

sentences.en: Some generalizing forms for monotone class theorems of functional forms are given.
sentences.cn: 给出了函数形式的单调类定理的几种推广形式.

sentences.en: The evidence was read out to the court in a dull monotone.
sentences.cn: 证据被当庭呆板地宣读了一遍。

sentences.en: The monotone in which he spoke was strangely soothing.
sentences.cn: 他说话的调子毫无抑扬顿挫,却有一种奇妙的镇静作用.

sentences.en: The monotone of his occupation soothed him.
sentences.cn: 他的职业里那种单调,使他觉得舒服.

sentences.en: These are just some monotone concrete buildings.
sentences.cn: 这些只是些单调的混凝土建筑。

sentences.en: We mainly consider completely monotone functions from semigroup to operator algebras.
sentences.cn: 我们主要讨论了作用在半群上取值于算子代数的完全单调函数.

words.tran_cn: 单音节的；一音节的；简短的
单调的；无变化的；产生单音调的
单调的，无抑扬顿挫的；无变化的

trans.tran_en: A monotone sound or surface does not have any variation in its tone or colour

trans.tran_cn: 单调的语调，单调的声音
trans.tran_en: a sound or way of speaking or singing that continues on the same note without getting any louder or softer, and therefore sounds very boring
